name: Iron-Man
description: A wealthy entrepreneur and genius inventor, Tony Stark, who becomes a superhero in a high-tech armor suit.

name: Batman
description: The Dark Knight of Gotham, Bruce Wayne, fights crime using his intellect, physical prowess, and wealth.

name: Luffy
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary treasure, One Piece.

name: Gohan
description: The eldest son of Goku, Gohan possesses immense fighting skills and powers from a young age.
power: Super Saiyan transformations, immense combat strength

name: Elon Musk
description: A visionary entrepreneur and engineer, leading ventures such as SpaceX, Tesla, Inc., and Neuralink, aiming to revolutionize transportation, space travel, and human-computer interface.

name: Nikola Tesla
description: A pioneering inventor and electrical engineer known for his contributions to the design of the modern alternating current (AC) electricity supply system.
power: Electrical engineering, inventions in AC power

name: Deadpool
description: Wade Wilson, a disfigured mercenary with the superhuman ability of regeneration and physical prowess, is known for his eccentric sense of humor.
power: Regenerative healing factor, skilled marksman and swordsman
